get.description: API gets the list of child section along with articles under given category

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The from index. from starts with 1, not 0.

schema.description: The from index. from starts with 1, not 0.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The sortBy param for the list articles

schema.description: The sortBy param for the list articles

get.description: This API lists the positions of help articles to enable manual sorting. Only leaf categories that have a maximum of 1000 articles can be repositioned.

post.description: This API helps you manually sort articles in your knowledge base. Only leaf categories that have a maximum of 1000 articles can be repositioned.

parameters.name: reviewOwnerId
parameters.description: Review Owner user Id to get the topics where this user has review permission

schema.description: Review Owner user Id to get the topics where this user has review permission

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort based on categoryname or sortorder. Allowed values are @categoryname@ and @sortorder@

schema.description: Sort based on categoryname or sortorder. Allowed values are @categoryname@ and @sortorder@

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: ID of the department to associate with the category
View to apply while listing help articles. Values allowed are: LISTVIEW and OVERVIEW.
Visibility setting of the category. Values allowed are: AGENTS, GROUP_USERS, ALL_USERS, and NONE.
ID of the department to associate with the category
A brief description of the category
ID of the help center to which the knowledge base belongs
Number of help articles under the category
Key that specifies whether the category must be featured in the help center or not
Position of the category in the overall order of categories of the same level
Key that specifies whether the category must be visible in the help center or not
ID of the Zoho Workdrive folder (Gallery) associated with the category
Key that specifies whether review must be enabled for the category or not

articleViewType.description: View to apply while listing help articles. Values allowed are: LISTVIEW and OVERVIEW.

isReview.description: Key that specifies whether review must be enabled for the category or not

description.description: A brief description of the category

featuredCategory.description: Key that specifies whether the category must be featured in the help center or not

isVisibleInHC.description: Key that specifies whether the category must be visible in the help center or not
